name: RoadXpert
description: RoadXpert is an AI-powered mobile application designed to enhance cyclist safety. By using real-time object detection, the app identifies road hazards such as potholes, vehicles, and traffic lights. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), RoadXpert runs directly on smartphones mounted to bicycle handlebars, offering an accessible, lightweight, and responsive safety companion for daily rides.
short_description: RoadXpert is a smart mobile assistant that uses AI to help cyclists detect road hazards in real time, improving safety and awareness.

name: Next Step
description: Next Step is a platform designed to help junior job seekers build a strong online presence and enter the job market with confidence. It offers tailored LinkedIn profile recommendations, resume generation and improvements, and personalized job suggestions—making the job search process simpler, faster, and more effective.
short_description: Next Step empowers junior job seekers with personalized tools to boost their online presence and land the right job faster.

name: CitySense
description: CitySense is a web application designed to simplify and modernize urban issue reporting. The platform allows citizens to report problems (e.g., potholes, broken streetlights) through text, photo, or voice recordings. AI tools analyze the input, classify issues, and assign priority levels to help municipal authorities address them efficiently. Citizens can track issue status and engage with the community, while municipal authorities use a dashboard for issue management.
short_description: CitySense is a web application designed to simplify and modernize urban issue reporting.

name: TL Copilot
description: TL Co-Pilot is an AI productivity tool for team leaders. Record meetings, upload audio, or submit transcripts; our AI analyzes them for key actions. It integrates with Google Workspace, auto-creating calendar events & tasks. This ensures no follow-up is missed, letting you monitor progress in-app. Simplify post-meeting admin, track commitments, and boost team productivity.
short_description: TL Co-Pilot: Your AI assistant for effortless meeting management. It processes meetings & comms, auto-creating & tracking actions to keep you organized and productive.

name: MOOCraft
description: MOOCraft transforms recorded lectures into professional, studio-quality MOOC videos. The platform automates slide extraction, audio enhancement, and transcription, then generates an AI-driven 3D avatar of the lecturer synchronized with the content. MOOCraft enables educators to easily repurpose existing lectures into engaging, accessible online courses—saving time and resources for both teachers and learners.
short_description: MOOCraft transforms recorded lectures into professional MOOC videos by extracting slides, enhancing audio, and creating engaging AI-driven avatar presentations for online learning.

name: RICO
description: RICO is an AI-powered platform that helps businesses analyze customer feedback from surveys. It uses sentiment analysis to classify responses, identify key trends, and generate actionable insights. RICO provides clear recommendations and performance reports to improve customer experience and highlight areas that need attention.
short_description: Turn customer feedback into smart business decisions – with RICO.

name: Work Wise
description:
Our system’s goal is to prepare the users for their job interviews.
We help our users organize their interviews, learn from past experiences, perfect their resumes, and learn their strengths and abilities. Furthermore, we help our users by providing them with information about the company and sources for learning skills that the job requires them to know.
short_description: AI powered interview preparation

name: Read My Lips
description: The project aims to help transcribe videos from environments where the audio is unusable or full of unrelated noise and to serve as a tool to help the deaf community
short_description: A lip reading project aimed to transcribe audio-less videos.

name: EncryptoSphere
description: EncryptoSphere is an open-source solution designed to meet the critical need for privacy and security in file storage and sharing through public cloud platforms like Google Drive and Dropbox. The system employs advanced encryption alongside file fragmentation ensuring that no single file fragment is stored in one location.
short_description: EncryptoSphere protects your files using smart encryption and fragmentation before they ever touch the cloud.

name: test
description: asdasd
short_description: testing

name: VORify
description: Raspberry Pi-hosted algorithm that determines your aircraft's location based on VOR radio stations, without relying on GPS signal.
short_description: Determine your location based on VOR radio stations

name: SnapChef
description: Visit our website at https://snapchef-app.vercel.app/
short_description: A mobile app for creating AI-generated recipes based on available ingredients

name: CipherEye
description:
CipherEye is a Linux-based system that provides real-time visibility into encrypted network traffic. Using technologies like eBPF and ptrace, it monitors live processes and identifies sensitive data—such as PII—before it leaves the system. Without relying on proxies or pre-shared keys, CipherEye delivers deep insights and enhanced security with minimal overhead and zero disruption to operations. 




Github - https://github.com/cyber-project-401
short_description: CipherEye is an advanced system for real-time analysis and classification of plain text and encrypted network traffic, operating seamlessly within the Linux kernel.

name: StyleScanner
description: Developed an advanced system for predicting the price range of clothing items by analyzing their images alongside key attributes such as brand, fabric, season, and style. The system leverages state-of-the-art machine learning techniques, primarily CNN and XGboost. By integrating visual features with contextual data, the model delivers accurate and adaptive price range predictions, facilitating informed and fair pricing decisions for both sellers and buyers in the fashion industry.
short_description: This project aims to create a smart system that predicts clothing prices by analyzing the item's image the user has uploaded.

name: SignEase
description: SignEase is an AI-powered platform that instantly translates American Sign Language (ASL) into clear English, from video uploads to live signing. Built to empower the Deaf community, creators, and educators, it makes communication more inclusive and accessible—no voice needed.
short_description: SignEase transforms ASL into fluent English text - instantly. Upload videos or go live and watch your signs become words in real time.

name: SysInsight
description:
A research of an undocumented windows encryption minifilter driver FileCrypt.
This projects goal is to reverse engineer this windows driver and discover how it works.
short_description: FileCrypt WIndows driver decompilation and research

name: Deep Picker
description: Deep Picker is an end-to-end web app that uses deep learning on NBA stats since 1996 to predict team performance. Users can input their current roster, explore player additions, and instantly see how changes impact team chemistry. The Deep Picker project enables smarter, data-driven recruitment decisions for NBA team managers..
short_description: Stirring up the perfect NBA lineup with deep learning

name: LockTalk
description: LockTalk is a secure, user-friendly app that enhances WhatsApp by giving you full control over encryption for text messages and photos. Designed to protect private conversations from external threats, LockTalk ensures that only authorized users can unlock and view sensitive content — even if someone else has access to your phone. Go beyond standard protections with customizable security that keeps your private chats truly private, without changing how you use WhatsApp..
short_description: An innovative mobile app providing secure communication with full user control over encryption for WhatsApp.

name: Agendify
description: Agendify is a X-based project that helps promote specific agendas using the X API according to the user specification. The system analyzes posts with ChatGPT to understand their content and sentiment, then generates relevant replies that align with the user's desired agenda. This creates a more dynamic and impactful presence on X, enabling users or organizations to advocate for their causes effectively.
short_description: Agendify is a tool that uses the X API and ChatGPT to analyze posts, assess sentiment, and generate agenda-aligned replies.

name: Safe Sound
description: The system consists of an Android app enabling an end-to-end solution for recording, analyzing, in order to detect problematic interactions. SafeSound processes audio recordings in real time in order to identify problematic tones and offensive language using AI-driven audio analysis, offering peace of mind for families and caretakers.
short_description: SafeSound is an end to end app designed to enhance the safety and well-being of elderly clients in care settings by monitoring and analyzing real-time conversations.

name: FinTrack
description: FinTrack leverages cutting-edge data science to provide real-time financial insights. It helps users monitor spending habits, detect unusual transactions, and forecast future expenses using predictive analytics. With smart visualizations and personalized tips, FinTrack empowers individuals to take control of their finances and plan ahead with confidence.
short_description: FinTrack is a smart financial insights app that uses data science to help users track spending, predict expenses, and make better money decisions in real time.

name: Mini Lawyer
description:
Mini Lawyer uses advanced NLP and machine learning to help lawyers and law students:

– Search all Israeli laws and judgments
– Find relevant legal content for any case
– Analyze cases with statistical insights
– Get guidance to build strong arguments

A professional-grade tool for streamlining legal research and analysis.
short_description: An AI-powered legal platform offering easy access to laws, judgments, and cases through a smart, user-friendly interface.

name: Finova
description: Finova is an AI-powered stock forecasting platform that analyzes real-time market data and social sentiment, including influencers' activity, to predict stock trends. It features an integrated AI chatbot that simulates advisory interactions and supports decision-making. Forecasts are based on a mix of statistical and AI models. The platform includes interactive charts and a clean, responsive UI for investors at all levels.
short_description: Finova is an AI-powered stock forecasting platform that analyzes real-time market data and social sentiment to help users identify potential investment opportunities.

name: NutriTrack
description: NutriTrack combines meal recognition, barcode scanning and restaurant menu recognition to help users maintain healthier eating habits. It leverages cutting-edge technologies like machine learning, image recognition, and advanced APIs for data analysis and processing. Our goal in NutriTrack is to provide an easy and accessible way to track your nutrition and make all the right choices according to your goals.
short_description: NutriTrack is an AI-driven platform designed to provide users with a personalized and automated nutrition tracking experience.

name: Chatastrophe
description: Chatastrophe is an innovative and automated pentesting system specifically designed to test the security of GenAI chatbots. With the rise of GenAI chatbots in many industries, there’s a growing concern about maliciously using them for performing unintended actions such as data leakage. Chatastrophe addresses this critical need by evaluating a chatbot’s responses to various attack scenarios which include a lot of challenges in the form of prompts.
short_description: An automated pentesting system dedicated to AI powered chatbots

name: Disk Analysis
description: The system automates forensic analysis of disk images, reducing the time and effort needed for manual investigations. By leveraging advanced analytics, it helps security professionals detect and respond to threats more effectively. Integrated visualization tools enhance situational awareness, enabling teams to better understand risks and take informed action. This streamlines the investigation process and strengthens overall system security.
short_description: Analyzes disk images to detect threats and persistence using Elasticsearch and visual tools, automating forensics and boosting investigation efficiency.

name: Fletcher
description: The model is designed to receive a music concert file and remove any background noises like clapping or phone notifications so eventually you'll get a clean music file.
short_description: Deep learning model for background denoising in audio music concert files

name: eb-shield
description:
In today’s technological landscape, effective kernel-level process monitoring
presents significant challenges. Traditional tools often lack flexibility, require
intrusive modifications, and impose high overhead. This project leverages the
power of eBPF to provide a dynamic, efficient, and user-friendly solution for
real-time monitoring and profiling at the kernel level
short_description: advanced firewall based on eBPF, designed to monitor network traffic at the process level on Linux servers. The system enables learning, profiling, and managing custom traffic rule

name: SugARate
description: SugARate is a mobile app for people with Type 1 diabetes. Using AI and image recognition, it analyzes photos of meals to identify foods, estimate carb content, and recommend personalized insulin doses. It considers user-specific data like insulin-to-carb ratio and glucose levels. Features include meal history, CGM integration, reminders, and educational tools. SugARate simplifies insulin calculations and supports better diabetes management
short_description: SugARate helps Type 1 diabetics calculate insulin doses using AI. It identifies food from photos, estimates carbs, and offers personalized insulin recommendations based on medical data.

name: WhyNot100
description:
The goal of this project is to create an AI-driven application that helps users analyze and summarize question-based documents or learning materials.
By using advanced natural language processing techniques, the system extracts the most relevant questions and clusters them. 
The tool is especially useful for users who regularly work with large volumes of assessments or instructional content—such as teachers, students, tutors, and training professionals.
short_description:
This project focuses on developing an AI-powered application that summarizes user-uploaded documents or tests.
https://github.com/Roeishmil/FSDFront
https://github.com/EldarAbo/FSDBackend

name: DataVault
description: Data Vault is a secure DLP platform designed to help organizations manage sensitive files with confidence. Users can easily upload documents, control access via ACLs, track file activity, and receive real-time alerts — all through a unified and intuitive interface that prioritizes both usability and security.
short_description: A DLP platform for uploading, securing, and tracking sensitive documents — all in one place.

name: Smarketing
description: Our project is a smart digital marketing platform designed to help small and medium-sized businesses create landing pages and automate ad campaigns using AI. The system analyzes campaign performance, optimizes ads, and saves business owners time and money.
short_description: Smart marketing

name: Pro Safe
description:
PRO SAFE is a real-time safety monitoring system for construction sites and factories.
It uses live video feeds and AI to automatically detect workers who are not wearing helmets.
When a safety violation is found, the system immediately sends an alert to the admin.
The goal is to improve safety, reduce accidents, and help managers track compliance across different work areas.
short_description: Smart monitoring of safety violations in the workplace

name: FestifAI
description:
Our website is a platform designed to help users find music festivals around the world based on their personal preferences while using their Spotify account, users will receive personalized festival recommendations according to their favorite genres.
The website provides detailed information about each festival, and creates three different packages, each includes flights and accommodations. 
Our goal is to create an easy match between users’ musical tastes and their desired festival experience.
short_description: FestifAI helps festival goers find customized packages given their preferences, such as favorite genres provided from their Spotify account. We create a fun, easy holiday package searching experience.

name: Pension today
description: Our service recommends the best pension fund for each individual based on their personal data, as well as predictions of the most suitable fund. Every personal detail influences the level of risk assigned to the user. We run AI algorithms and a complex neural network to accurately predict the expected returns of pension funds.
short_description: Our service recommends the best pension fund for each individual based on personal data and performance predictions of pension funds using advanced AI tools.

name: Planorama
description: An advanced platform for event hosts, providing a convenient and centralized tool for managing and organizing all stages of event preparation. From inviting guests and sending digital invitations, to continuously updating the guest list based on RSVP responses, and up to optimizing seating arrangements with smart AI-based recommendations for personalized seating.
short_description: An advanced platform for event hosts, providing a convenient and centralized tool for managing and organizing all stages of event preparation.

name: KaRLI
description: The primary objective of the platform is to maximize user profits by integrating state-of-the-art machine learning models with personalized investment insights. By combining cutting-edge algorithms, financial market analysis, and real-time data, the system delivers actionable and intelligent trading decisions for diverse user portfolios.
short_description: KaRLI involves the development of an advanced software platform that leverages Deep Learning and Reinforcement Learning to enable automated investment portfolio management in the stock market.

name: RooMatch
description: RooMatch is a smart matchmaking app for roommates and property owners. Roommates set preferences and discover compatible living options, while owners list apartments. The app offers profile previews, swipe actions, Google Sign-In, and a personalized recommendation engine. Built with Kotlin (Android) and Ktor (backend), RooMatch streamlines the housing search experience through clean design and intelligent matching.
short_description: RooMatch is a smart apartment and roommate matching platform helping property owners and seekers connect based on preferences, lifestyle, and compatibility.

name: Graphity
description: Graphity is an advanced Data Science project that leverages machine learning to classify malicious binary files based exclusively on the structural topology of their functions' Control Flow Graphs (CFGs). Without relying on assembly code or instruction-level features, Graphity extracts meaningful graph-based representations to accurately attribute each sample to a specific malware family or threat actor group, as well as identify the malware type.
short_description: Graphity classifies malware binaries by analyzing the shape of their Control Flow Graphs, revealing both malware type and likely threat actor group.

name: KiddyBank
description: This app is a smart and engaging financial tool designed for children aged 6 to 17, helping them learn the value of money and how to manage it responsibly. It teaches key skills like budgeting, saving, and investing, with guidance from parents. The app promotes financial literacy through hands-on learning and real-world experience.
short_description: A fun and educational financial app for kids aged 6–17 that teaches budgeting, saving, and smart spending.

name: FRAIRSS
description: FRAIRSS  is an advanced AI-powered platform designed for financial recommendations and robo-advisory services. It offers personalized investment insights based real-time data. The system also provides real-time market forecasts, helping users stay ahead with dynamic trend predictions and smart analytics. Additionally, FRAIRSS incorporates social sentiment analysis to understand public opinion from various social media and news sources.
short_description: AI-Powered Financial Recommendation and Roboadvisor Smart System

name: CommuneCart
description:
CommuneCart consolidates deliveries by area, reducing costs for both users and businesses.

By identifying the optimal delivery day and group for each user, nearby users are automatically added to group purchases and unlock discounts that wouldn’t be available otherwise—no coordination needed.

The platform provides businesses and service providers with a complete digital storefront, including product and calendar management, along with smart delivery optimization powered by NVIDIA cuOpt.
short_description: CommuneCart is a platform designed to connect communities and local businesses through smart, automatic group deals—making shopping cheaper, easier, and more impactful.

name: GainPlay
description:
Personalized Workouts: AI-powered exercise plans tailored to your fitness level, goals, and available time
Achievement System: Earn coins and experience points as you complete workouts to level up your fitness journey
Custom Avatars: Express yourself with unique avatars purchased through coins earned during workouts
Goal Tracking: Set personalized fitness goals and monitor your progress with intuitive metrics
short_description: gamified fitness application that transforms your workout journey into an engaging experience

name: SecuRent
description: SecuRent is a digital platform that replaces the outdated practice of leaving physical items—like ID cards or phones—as collateral when renting goods. Our app offers a secure, modern alternative that streamlines the rental process and builds trust between renters and businesses by using AI to evaluate and verify businesses for reliability and safety.
short_description: modernizes item rentals by replacing physical deposits with a digital solution.

name: ForPay
description:
The ForPay Project is a pioneering initiative to develop a comprehensive digital wallet system that eliminates the need for traditional credit cards. 
Designed to streamline financial management, the platform focuses on payroll services and employee management tools tailored for business accounts, while also addressing the unique financial needs of foreign workers.
short_description: ForPay is a digital wallet platform aimed at providing payroll services and facilitating financial transactions for businesses and users. In collaboration with Open Finance.

name: UXpert
description: UXpert transforms website development through intelligent analysis of UI/UX factors affecting user engagement. It evaluates your website across key metrics, providing actionable insights tailored to your audience and industry. Beyond identifying issues, UXpert's AI generates visual HTML mockups of improvement opportunities. With an intuitive step-by-step process, UXpert makes professional UI/UX optimization accessible to developers and business owners alike.
short_description: UXpert is an AI-powered platform that analyzes websites, providing comprehensive UI/UX evaluations and tailored recommendations based on your specific audience, industry, and emotional goals.

name: EasyCook
description: EasyCook is a smart recipe and meal planning system designed to optimize grocery shopping and reduce food expenses. The platform integrates with supermarkets to generate personalized meal plans and shopping lists based on user preferences, dietary needs, and real-time store prices.
short_description: EasyCook - recipe App

name: SocialBoost
description: SocialBoost is a smart website for creating, scheduling, and posting Instagram content. It uses AI to generate images and videos for posts, reels, and stories based on the user’s style. With a built-in Scheduler for automatic posting and a simple dashboard for tracking growth, engagement, and audience insights, users can manage their content easily and effectively.
short_description: SocialBoost is a website for creating and scheduling Instagram content, with custom visuals and a simple dashboard to track performance and understand your audience.

name: DeepSeed
description: Infected tomato seed classification using hyperspectral images from Volcani institute. Another goal is to find the best bands for classification in order to replace the expensive, slow, hyperspectral camera with a cheap, fast multispectral one. This will help in high scale classification of millions of seeds. After finding the infected ones, a laser can burn them and prevent them from growing, so the virus wouldn't spread.
short_description: Infected seed classification using computer vision.

name: Code Elevate
description: Your AI-powered programming companion that transforms how developers learn to code. Combining personalized learning paths, interactive exercises, and AI-driven code reviews, CodeElevate helps you master programming concepts at your own pace. it delivers targeted feedback and adapts to your unique learning style - turning coding challenges into stepping stones for growth.
short_description: Master programming with personalized AI guidance. Learn through interactive exercises, get instant feedback on your code, and follow customized learning paths designed for your unique goals and pace.

name: ShapeUp
description:
We’re redefining gym access with a flexible platform that empowers users to work out on their own terms, without long-term memberships. Whether you need a one-time workout, a short-term package, or want to explore fitness while traveling, choose what fits your lifestyle. Users can book 1, 3, or 5-day passes for seamless gym access. Gym owners can showcase facilities, optimize off-peak occupancy, and drive new revenue. 
Our vision: make fitness more accessible, flexible, and global.
short_description: ShapeUp redefines gym access by offering flexible, one-time, 3-day, or 5-day passes, allowing users to seamlessly book gyms without long-term memberships to work out on their own terms.

name: GPT
description:
GPT Generative Public Transport, is a smart city planning solution that uses artificial intelligence to automatically design efficient bus lanes. The system generates optimized bus routes and lane allocations to improve coverage, reduce congestion, and support sustainable mobility. Powered by deep reinforcement learning and geospatial data, the AI adapts plans to the unique layout and needs of each city.
The solution addresses a major challenge for municipalities: urban transportation planning.
short_description:
AI system for designing optimized bus lanes for cities. 
Advancing city transportation to the next level!

name: Social.Ai
description: An AI-powered social media management platform that fully replaces a human manager. It analyzes a business’s profile to craft optimal strategies, handling everything from creative content ideas and image generation to scheduling and publishing. Content is tailored dynamically based on engagement data, with options for custom or template-based posts.
short_description: An intelligent platform for fully automated social media content management, replacing a human social media manager with personalized AI.

name: SportScanner
description: SportScanner is an AI-powered platform that helps sports fans discover, plan, and create their ideal sports experiences by generating match-based travel packages tailored to individual and group preferences, using real-time data from Skyscanner, StubHub And and AI-driven insights.
short_description: SportScanner is an AI powered platform for generating sport matches based travel packages that are tailored for you and your group of friends preferences

name: BeyondTheWords
description: BeyondTheWords analyzes and compares complex versions of the U.S. Tax Code before and after the TCJA reform, using advanced NLP and semantic similarity models. By structuring, cleaning, and embedding thousands of hierarchical legal sections, the project reveals whether textual changes reflect real legal reform or merely editorial rewriting.
short_description: An intelligent legal comparison engine that unveils what really changed in tax law - Beyond the words.

name: GroundVision
description: GroundVision designed to accurately predict and estimate the value of real estate properties offered through tenders by the Israel Land Authority. It analyzes diverse data, including environmental factors and historical tender results of properties with similar characteristics, providing precise, data-driven land valuations. This enables users to make informed, strategic decisions during the tendering process.
short_description: GroundVision is providing precise, data-driven land valuations to accurately estimate real estate values in Israel Land Authority tenders.

name: ShadowSnare
description: ShadowSnare is an advanced malware detection system that leverages deep learning techniques to identify obfuscated and hard-to-detect threats. Users can upload files containing features extracted from memory dump files, receive instant predictions, and view visual explanations to better understand potential risks. ShadowSnare helps bridge the gap between cutting-edge machine learning and real-world cybersecurity protection.
short_description: ShadowSnare is a desktop application designed to detect obfuscated malware using deep learning techniques.

name: ORNY
description:
ORNY is an AI-based emotion classifier that analyzes voice recordings to detect and interpret emotions.
By identifying vocal cues like tone, pitch, and rhythm, ORNY recognizes feelings such as happiness, sadness, anger, fear, and more. It helps users gain deeper insight into the emotional states hidden within speech. With its warm, minimal design and focus on empathy, ORNY turns sound into understanding—enabling more meaningful conversations and emotionally aware technology.
short_description: ORNY turns sound waves into emotional insight.

name: WeDetect
description: WeDetect is a high-performance 3D object detection model using LiDAR for real-time recognition. Designed for autonomous vehicles, robotics, and smart traffic systems, it accurately detects cars, buses, cyclists, and pedestrians in all lighting and weather conditions, offering a reliable alternative to vision-based systems.
short_description: WeDetect is a real-time 3D object detection system using LiDAR to accurately identify vehicles, cyclists, and pedestrians in dynamic environments.

name: ShopSmart
description: ShopSmart is a smart shopping assistant that helps users compare retail items and build cost-effective shopping carts to save money. Powered by AI, it also suggests personalized alternatives based on user preferences like vegan, gluten-free, and more.
short_description: ShopSmart helps users compare retail items, build smart shopping carts, and get AI-based suggestions tailored to their preferences.

name: Canonicar
description: Reinforcement Learning-based project using PPO algorithm to enable a car drive autonomously and efficiently in the CARLA simulation environment, optimizing for both speed and safety.
short_description:
Autonomously driven car using Reinforcement Learning.
Visit for more information: https://canonicar.streamlit.app/

name: GAN based rlaif
description: This research investigates the difference between standard Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) and a modified GAN architecture that incorporates an additional preference feedback system. made by Ohad Montaniez, supervise Moshe Butman.
short_description: Image Generation Using GAN Guided By AI Prefrence feedback

name: Baby Motion
description: The project presents a system for assessing infants’ motor development via video analysis using advanced body pose detection models (YOLO, MoveNet, MediaPipe) and deep learning. It extracts key body points and motion features, applying trained neural networks to evaluate movement quality. Results are shown in a user-friendly interface with graphical and numerical summaries to help professionals and parents track progress and detect anomalies.
short_description: A system for monitoring and detecting developmental anomalies in infants.

name: Out of the Closet
description:
Your smart, personal outfit assistant
Tired of staring at your closet with nothing to wear? Out of the Closet helps you build outfits using color theory and fashion rules, mixing clothes you already own with new items from real online stores — all based on your style, body type, and favorite colors.
Just upload photos or links to your clothes and get outfit ideas that actually work for you. It’s like having a personal stylist in your pocket.
short_description: Out of the Closet helps you create outfits from your wardrobe and discover new clothing from leading fashion websites, based on your style, size, and favorite colors.

name: Proactive
description: Proactive is an intelligent monitoring solution that records real user interactions via a browser extension and transforms them into automated tests. These tests run periodically, simulating user behavior to proactively detect performance degradation, unexpected downtime, or functional issues—ensuring your system is always one step ahead of problems.
short_description: A proactive monitoring system that simulates real user actions to detect performance issues, slowdowns, and malfunctions—before your users even notice

name: Insight It
description:
Lead your team with clarity and boost performance with Insight It. Optimize daily workflows, enhance collaboration, and uncover new efficiencies. Whether you're handling daily tasks or big-picture goals, Insight It helps you work smarter, communicate better, and achieve more. Take your team to new heights—faster and more effectively.
https://insight-it.cs.colman.ac.il/
short_description:
Manage your team better, and take your team to new heights.
Use Insight It to improve your team's daily work and help your management become more efficient than ever!

name: Where is Epi
description: "Where Is Epi" is a mobile app that enhances the safety of individuals with severe allergies by connecting them to nearby EpiPen holders via geolocation. It features an SOS button, real-time alerts, and an AI-powered chatbot that offers personalized guidance based on symptoms and context. By fostering a supportive community, the app ensures faster emergency response and greater peace of mind for allergy sufferers.
short_description: "Where Is Epi" connects people with severe allergies to nearby EpiPen holders using geolocation, SOS alerts, and an AI chatbot for fast, personalized emergency support.

name: Audielens
description: Audielens' AI-driven web app empowers influencers amidst vast social media data. Our platform analyzes audience info via BERTopic for nuanced topic and sentiment insights. A FastAPI backend, Next.js frontend, and Gemini-powered LLM Agent simplify understanding for Gen Z influencers.
short_description: Audielens leverages Ai to empower influencers to better connect with their online community.

name: Play Smart
description: PlaySmart is an intelligent recommendation platform designed to assist professional soccer teams in managing their roster and optimizing game strategy. The system leverages AI to analyze key factors such as player performance, injury risk, fatigue levels, game importance, and historical data, enabling coaches to make informed decisions for both upcoming and live matches.
short_description: An AI-powered soccer management app that recommends optimal lineups, tracks injuries and fatigue, and assists coaches with data-driven decisions before and during matches.

name: Rush Hour Solver
description: This project simulates and solves the Rush Hour puzzle using reinforcement learning (RL) techniques. It supports both classic state-vector and image-based environments and includes tools for board generation, training, evaluation, visualization, and difficulty assessment.
short_description: A Rush Hour puzzle solver using reinforcement learning with image and state-based environments, dynamic board generation, difficulty scoring, and visualization tools.

name: RoadEye
description: Roadeye is a machine learning platform that boosts road safety by detecting and reporting accidents, police, and construction zones in real time. Using a custom YOLOv8 model, it connects to any phone camera via a website link—no app needed. The system analyzes road footage and GPS data, then auto-reports hazards to Waze. Powered by Redis, Appium, and Ngrok, Roadeye makes smart, safe driving effortless.
short_description: No app. No installs. Just a link. Roadeye uses your phone’s camera to spot crashes, cops, and roadwork—pushing real-time alerts straight to Waze.

name: A(nt)I.Bully
description: A(nt)I.Bully is an AI-based system integrated with Discord to detect cyberbullying and alert parents in real time. It monitors private and group chats, identifies offensive language, threats, or inappropriate images, and sends anonymized alerts to a mobile app for parents. The system ensures full data encryption, respects children's privacy, and includes parental control features. All data is securely stored and complies with privacy standards such as GDPR.
short_description: AI-powered Discord bot that detects bullying and alerts parents while preserving children's privacy.

name: SigmaTokens
description:
SigmaTokens is an intrusion detection system that identifies unauthorized access by deploying honeytokens, a fake, deceptive data across sensitive endpoints.
These tokens lure attackers and trigger alerts once accessed. 
Our system logs suspicious interactions and provides clients with tools to manage honeytokens, view alerts, and analyze threat patterns.
Using deception as a detection method, SigmaTokens improves visibility and supports early identification of malicious behavior.
short_description:
SigmaTokens is an Intrusion Detection System that deploys honeytokens, a fake, deceptive data across sensitive endpoints, to detect and log malicious activity.

Github: https://github.com/SigmaTokens

name: SnapDiet
description: SnapDiet AI is a smart system that helps users track their diet by analyzing food photos using deep learning. It detects food items and provides instant nutritional info like calories and macronutrients. By removing the need for manual input, it makes healthy eating easier and more consistent. Just snap a photo, and get a full breakdown to help stay on track with your diet. It’s fast, accurate, and effortless.
short_description: SnapDiet AI combines deep learning and computer vision to extract nutritional data from food images, simplifying calorie tracking and promoting healthy eating habits.

name: TactiGrid
description: Our project is a secure, reliable communication system designed to boost battlefield effectiveness and soldier safety. By using smart wearable devices and real-time tracking tools, soldiers and commanders remain seamlessly connected even under challenging conditions. The system supports dynamic leadership changes, secure data management, effective tracking and recovery of data, ensuring missions stay on track regardless of unexpected scenarios.
short_description: TactiGrid: a secure wearable mesh network for real-time battlefield communications and tracking.

name: AutoMatch
description: AutoMatch is a fullstack web platform built to manage and enhance the experience of online chess tournaments. The platform is supported by an AI-powered anti-cheat mechanism to ensure fair gameplay and integrates with the Lichess API to seamlessly launch matches. Players can track their progress and performance in real time.
short_description: Fullstack platform for managing live chess tournaments with Lichess integration, real-time updates, and AI-based anti-cheat.

name: AquaKube
description: AquaKube is a smart security solution for Kubernetes environments. Using node-level monitoring, it detects threats and anomalies in real time. With an interactive dashboard, AquaKube gives organizations instant visibility, alerts, and control—making it easy to secure complex cloud infrastructure with speed and precision.
short_description: AquaKube is a smart security solution for Kubernetes clusters, using Rules and real-time monitoring to detect threats and visualize risks instantly.

name: Eventure
description:
The application will have an interface for event producers and service providers and will make the whole process of finding and connecting to service providers very simple.
From listing the event’s needed services and all the way to sealing a deal with all the providers, with our platform producing an event will be a much simpler process that can be managed in one single place.
short_description: Eventure is an AI-powered platform that simplifies event planning by connecting producers with service providers, streamlining logistics, and formalizing agreements in one centralized hub.

name: TripBuddy
description: TripBuddy is a comprehensive travel assistant designed to help users plan their ideal trip from start to finish. It goes beyond just basic trip planning by focusing on matching travelers with compatible travel partners based on a variety of parameters such as travel interests, schedules, and preferred activities. This ensures that everyone can find the perfect companion to share their adventure with.
short_description: A buddy for your trips.

name: ArchiTech
description: ArchiTech is a smart FinOps platform for cloud architects and DevOps teams to design optimized, cost-effective multi-cloud infrastructures. Using a drag-and-drop canvas, users can visually build architectures with services from AWS, Azure, and GCP. The platform integrates real-time pricing and uses an LLM-based AI to recommend budget-friendly solutions. It also generates Terraform code in real time, supporting fast deployment and FinOps-aligned cloud cost efficiency.
short_description: ArchiTech is a FinOps platform for designing smart multi-cloud architectures with drag-and-drop UI, AI-driven recommendations, and real-time Terraform code.

name: ExploreLens
description: Turn your phone into an interactive tour guide with Augmented Reality. Point your camera to discover nearby landmarks and cultural sites marked by clickable AR icons. Instantly access practical info and explore nearby hotels, restaurants, bars, and more through AR. Chat with an AI-powered guide that provides personalized answers, useful details, and insider tips. This app transforms every journey into an immersive experience of discovery and learning.
short_description: A smart AR-powered app that uses your camera to identify tourist sites and landmarks in real-time, displaying clickable icons with detailed historical and cultural information.

name: Milim
description:
A full-stack app designed for children wanting to learn another language using the world they see around them.

milim.cs.colman.ac.il
short_description: Speak your reality

name: SoundPatch AI
description: The project uses deep learning to detect and fix audio gaps in recorded conversations caused by network issues. It transcribes the audio, predicts missing speech with NLP, recreates it in the speaker’s voice using TTS, and inserts it into the file. A user-friendly tool will allow users to upload recordings, view suggested fixes, and download corrected versions. This offers a complete and automated solution to improve clarity and user experience in online audio and video content.
short_description: A tool that detects audio gaps in recordings, predicts missing speech using AI, recreates it in the speaker's voice, and outputs a seamlessly corrected version of the file

name: DevSecode
description:
DevSecode is a Visual Studio Code extension that helps developers write secure code by scanning for secrets, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations using 
open-source tools. It offers real-time alerts, an interactive dashboard and actionable recommendations-all within your editor.
short_description:
Scan for secrets, vulnerabilities and misconfigurations in VS Code using open-source tools. 
Get real-time alerts, a dashboard and actionable security insights.

name: Traffic signal control with RL
description: Our aim is to train RL agents using sparse data and partial observations over various types and levels of traffic intersections to prove that SOTA algorithms can still optimize and converge and achieve fairly good results even when the observations are incomplete (I.e, data was missing that should have been there) or over partial observations (intentionally use only parts of that data, but get the whole partial observations without unintentional missing data)
short_description: Using sparse data and partial observations and SOTA RL algorithms for traffic signal control

name: Redefining adversarial attacks
description:
A Fun Game: Redefining adversarial attacks through multi-agent collaboration.
Research exploring new adversarial attacks in the form of multi-agent game where the goal is to trick a classifier.
short_description:
A Fun Game: Redefining adversarial attacks through multi-agent collaboration.
Research exploring new adversarial attacks in the form of multi-agent game where the goal is to trick a classifier.

name: LiveAlign
description: Currently, individual trainees who do not attend a gym regularly have no way of knowing whether their movements are correct, which would help them perform exercises more effectively and reduce the risk of injuries. We aim to enable them, through a mobile app, to film themselves during their workout and receive live feedback on how to adjust their movements for optimal form.
short_description: Your own personal AI assistant coach

name: SMSecure
description: The app uses advanced artificial intelligence to analyze message content, check links, and identify suspicious senders. With models like BERT and GPT, it understands the intent behind the message, detects harmful phrasing, and provides a risk score along with a clear, user-friendly explanation of why the message may be malicious. The system continuously updates and improves through user feedback and exposure to new threats.
short_description: SMSecure is a smart security app for Android that detects and rates suspicious SMS messages in real time. It’s designed to protect users from smishing and fraud attempts- before they click the link.

name: Tovna
description: TOVNA streamlines the IEP process with intuitive tools for managing classes, viewing student profiles, and receiving personalized AI-driven recommendations. It supports educators with dynamic questionnaires, real-time progress tracking, and actionable insights to define goals and strategies. Designed for the Israeli education system, TOVNA integrates smoothly with existing school infrastructure for accurate, efficient planning.
short_description: TOVNA is an AI-based platform that helps special education teachers prepare IEPs by collecting data, generating insights, and tracking student progress, tailored to Israel’s system.

name: SmartBag
description: SmartBag is an AI-driven financial platform that evaluates risk and predicts stock prices for bank portfolios. It integrates machine learning models with real-time data to deliver dynamic risk assessments and forecasts. In collaboration with OpenFinance.ai, SmartBag enhances its insights with high-quality financial data, helping banks optimize portfolios, uncover opportunities, and manage volatility. Learn more at SmartBag.
short_description: SmartBag is an AI-powered platform that evaluates portfolio risk and predicts stock prices using advanced models and real-time financial data.

name: AdaptEd
description: An adaptive learning platform for psychometric exam prep that adjusts questions based on student skill level using Google Gemini. It includes a smart Learning Advisor to guide students on academic admissions, score requirements, and effective study strategies—offering a modern alternative to traditional book-based methods.
short_description: Adaptive psychometric prep platform that personalizes questions via Gemini and includes a smart advisor for study tips and academic guidance.

name: Jobie
description: Using the experiences of the masses, alongside an AI that can find your good qualities, we'll create a tailor-made Roadmap, specifically for you, consisting of Milestones that include actionable tasks for you to do in order to elevate your professional goals, and supercharge your career path
short_description: An AI-based career advisor that will take you to the next level

name: Spiker
description:
Spiker is a revolutionary device designed to effectively control birds, especially pigeons. 
Unlike traditional, less effective methods such as spikes, discs, or alarms, Spiker uses a targeted water spray to deter birds.
Equipped with a built-in camera, Spiker identifies pigeons and other birds using AI, accurately directs its water gun, and delivers a precise spray to discourage them.
Skeptical? View real-time or recorded footage captured by Spiker’s integrated camera: https://bit.ly/442UFy3
short_description: Your new intelligent pigeon control device

name: MathVenture
description: AI-powered tutoring platform combining real-time chat, multimodal input, and adaptive learning. Students interact with a purple book bot via WebSockets, speech recognition, TTS, and OCR for handwritten notes. It auto-generates post-lesson parent reports, tracks progress, and personalizes exercises. Built with React/TypeScript, Node.js/Express, MongoDB, GEMINI, Google STT/TTS. JWT-secured and scalable.
short_description: MathVenture is an AI tutoring platform for Hebrew speakers with live chat, speech recognition, TTS, and OCR. It adapts to each student with instant feedback, exercises, and progress tracking.

name: ORIA
description: Our system searches through an extensive music database to find songs that best match the vibe and message of your content. Instead of spending time scrolling through endless playlists, you get instant, contextually relevant song recommendations that enhance your story's impact. Perfect for Instagram stories, TikTok content, Facebook posts, and any other social media platform - where every image tells a story and every story deserves the perfect soundtrack to bring it to life.
short_description: AI-powered image analysis tool that scans photos with or without text to identify and recommend matching songs from a comprehensive music database for content creators, influencers or any other user.

name: SegMentor
description: SegMentor is an AI-powered platform designed to transform how learners engage with video-based content. SegMentor leverages advanced AI to automatically transcribe spoken content and segment videos based on topics and context. With full-text keyword search capabilities, learners can quickly locate relevant moments across entire video libraries. Targeted primarily at academic institutions and independent learners, .
short_description: SegMentor revolutionizes video-based learning with AI-driven automatic transcription, smart segmentation, and dynamic learning tools, making it easier and faster to extract insights from videos.

name: SB-Voting
description: Our project is a blockchain-based voting system that ensures secure, transparent, and tamper-proof elections. It uses decentralized nodes, cryptographic security, and encrypted authentication to protect voter anonymity and prevent fraud. The immutable ledger allows for full auditability, increasing trust in the electoral process.
short_description:
SB-Voting blockchain based voting system.
A secure, simple way to vote.

name: Ease
description: Web-based dashboard integrated with a mobile app to provide three interfaces: Customer (real-time text analysis, alerts, AI-driven solutions), Therapist & Volunteer (manage responses, monitor AI suggestions), and Administrator (system management, resource updates, data analytics). The app analyzes live user text via prompt engineering to improve responses and the database.
short_description: Web dashboard + mobile app for customers, therapists, and admins to provide real-time text-based emotional support, AI-driven analysis, alerts, and management tools.

name: WeddingzAI
description: Our AI wedding planning platform helps you generate a personalized to-do list, find and compare vendors, and design menus and invitations. Track expenses with a dynamic budget planner and manage guest lists, RSVPs, and seating charts with AI-assisted suggestions. Maintain a personal diary to record memories and vendor details, and stay on schedule with a unified task dashboard—all in one intuitive interface.
short_description: An AI-powered wedding planning platform that helps couples planning wedding.

name: SmartEat
description: SmartEat is a next-generation nutrition app that makes healthy eating effortless. Just snap a photo of your meal—SmartEat instantly identifies the food, analyzes its nutritional value, and provides personalized recommendations tailored to your goals. Powered by cutting-edge AI and designed with a sleek, intuitive interface, SmartEat helps you make smarter food choices—anytime, anywhere.
short_description: SmartEat uses AI to analyze meal photos, track nutrition, and give personalized dietary advice—making healthy eating easy through image recognition and a user-friendly interface.

name: Quizzer
description: An interactive learning platform that transforms YouTube videos into short summaries and engaging quizzes. Users can personalize, re-generate and export quizzes, making content review quick and fun. With built-in gamification—like streaks, rewards, and social features—users stay motivated through friendly competition and collaboration with friends.
short_description: An AI-powered social website that turns YouTube videos into interactive quizzes.

name: Aurora.io
description:
AI-powered cloud visualization and analysis platform that understands your environment like a real cloud architect.

• 360° cloud visualization
• AI-powered top 3 risks
• AI-driven Cloud Security Architect
• Export to Terraform

See your entire architecture, detect misconfigurations, export everything as Infrastructure as Code, and surface the top 3 AI-prioritized issues. Still confused? Just ask — the Security Architect delivers instant, architecture-aware answers.
short_description: A smart AI-powered cloud visualization system that understands your environment like a security architect — detects risks early and lets you ask anything about your cloud.

name: Database Monitoring System
description:
Database Monitoring System - improving database security and makes monitoring easier. The system will help to find and stop unusual or suspicious activities in databases.
Clear Rules: Unlike other systems our system will show users exactly how each rule works. Users can also change or create their own rules.
Smart Detection: The system will use AI to learn user behavior and detect unusual activities.
Automatic Blocking: Users can set up rules to block suspicious actions automatically.
short_description: Our project, Database Monitoring System - improving database security and makes monitoring easier. The system will help to find and stop unusual or suspicious activities in databases.

name: NextStep
description: Next Step is a neural network model that analyzes a candidate’s CV and instantly suggests the job title that best matches their skills , education and experience, streamlining hiring decisions for recruiters and guiding applicants toward their ideal next role.
short_description: NextStep will help you to find the best job for you according to your CV

name: LogLens: Service Insights
description: My research uses simple log data to uncover hidden patterns in micro-service interactions. By grouping similar interactions together, it could be used to reveal issues, performance insights, and security anomalies—without altering your existing system.
short_description: My research turns simple logs into clear insights, quickly revealing hidden patterns and anomalies in micro-services architectures

name: PacketPrints
description: This project explores how encrypted web traffic can still reveal identifying patterns. By analyzing features like packet size, timing, and sequence, we show that websites leave distinct "fingerprints" in their encrypted traffic. Using machine learning, our method can classify visited websites with high accuracy—highlighting both the power of traffic analysis and the privacy risks in encrypted communication.
short_description: Unmasking Websites: Identifying Web Activity through Encrypted Packet Patterns

name: SentimAIl
description: This system uses advanced data science techniques to analyze email communications in real-time, detecting emotional trends, flagging risks, and identifying patterns that matter to managers. It empowers proactive decision-making with easy-to-understand dashboards, alerts, and recommendations, helping organizations improve team dynamics and productivity.
short_description: Real-time sentiment analysis of company emails to help managers detect team dynamics, flag risks, and lead proactively.

name: WriteLess
description: This project enables users to upload an image containing handwritten Hebrew text to a Telegram bot. The image is processed using an OCR (Optical Character Recognition) pipeline that detects, segments, and classifies the handwritten characters. The recognized text is then reconstructed in reading order and compiled into a Word (.docx) file. The final document is sent back to the user through the Telegram bot.
short_description: Upload an image of hand written Hebrew text to a telegram bot and receive back a word file containing the text

name: VIP - Violence in Public
description: Our project focuses on developing a deep learning-based system to automatically detect violence in public spaces through video analysis. It aims to identify violent actions in real-time or from recorded footage using CNNs and other deep learning methods. The system includes an API for integration and a user-friendly interface for intuitive, real-time monitoring.
short_description: Deep learning-based system that detects violence in public spaces through video analysis.

name: OpenCredit
description: OpenCredit facilitates entrepreneurs’ access to credit applications in the real estate sector through a credit marketplace. By employing open banking, it establishes a secure and transparent platform for credit providers.
short_description: A credit marketplace for real estate entrepreneurs

name: IDM
description: An advanced Identity Management System streamlining user and access management. It automates account provisioning, role assignments, and access revocation, ensuring efficient lifecycle management. Designed for seamless integration with infrastructures like Active Directory and SharedFolders, it offers a scalable, cohesive solution, improving efficiency and delivering a user-friendly experience for admins and employees.
short_description: A unified Identity Management System automating user lifecycle and simplifying access control for efficient, user-friendly resource management.

name: CAM Sports
description: The platform supports tracking statistics from games, sharing footage, designing formations and training plans, collecting payments for expenses - while getting efficient AI based insights.
short_description: CAM Sports is designed to provide an all-in-one solution for managing and planning Volleyball team strategy and day to day operations.

name: SafeHer
description: The system uses a wearable pendant with a discreet SOS button and low-light camera, plus a mobile app for real-time data transmission. When pressed, the pendant captures a snapshot or video, encrypts it with GPS coordinates, and sends it to trusted contacts. The app lets users set emergency recipients, customize messages, and track help en route. With long battery life and secure cloud storage, SafeHer delivers reliable protection and privacy, empowering women with confidence.
short_description: SafeHer: an elegant pendant with SOS button and camera. One press sends an alert with your live location to trusted contacts. Safety within reach.

name: EcoSort
description:
EcoSort is a compact, AI-powered waste bin that automatically detects and sorts waste, making accurate recycling effortless for small spaces. It uses real-time image recognition to classify waste and separate it correctly — no user decisions, no contamination, no hassle.

Designed to be affordable and easy to use, EcoSort brings the power of smart sustainability to places that often lack the resources for complex recycling systems. Just drop in your waste — EcoSort handles the rest.
short_description: EcoSort is a smart, AI-driven bin that automatically sorts waste, making recycling easy and accurate for small organizations.

name: ImAround
description: I'mAround is an innovative dating app that leverages Bluetooth technology to help users discover and connect with people around them in real time. Whether you're on campus, at work, or attending an event, the app highlights nearby users to encourage natural, location-based interactions. By focusing on who’s physically close, I'mAround brings dating back to real-life moments and shared environments.
short_description: I'mAround is a real-time dating app that uses Bluetooth to connect people who are physically nearby, enhancing spontaneous encounters and meaningful connections.

name: SLAware
description: The SLA Breach Prediction System is a machine learning solution that predicts SLA breaches in service management by analyzing historical ticket data. It helps organizations proactively manage service tickets, ensuring timely resolution and minimizing risks. The system provides actionable insights and risk assessments, enabling facility managers to allocate resources effectively and address delays, integrating with existing workflows and displaying predictions via an interactive dashboard.
short_description: The SLA Breach Prediction System uses machine learning to predict SLA breaches in service management, enabling proactive ticket management and providing insights through an interactive dashboard.

name: PassPass
description: We at PassPass bring a simple clever solution which utilizes chrome’s extension system and a user’s smartphone as a keychain. There are no stored passwords involved. A user clicks a button on the web page on his workstation, receives a push notification on his mobile phone, authenticates using the phone’s built in biometric system, and within seconds the password waits at the password field.
short_description: Offering a Password-Less environment for organizations, currently using password-driven applications and services.

name: SocialClub
description: Social Club enables businesses to offer their visitors a unique social experience through temporary private chats tied to their location. Visitors can join chats specific to each business, interact with others currently at the venue, share photos and posts, and discover all participating businesses in an easy-to-navigate interface. The app fosters community and engagement by bringing people together in real time, enhancing both customer experience and business visibility.
short_description: Social Club is a real-time private chat app for businesses, letting visitors join location-based chats, share photos, and connect with others on-site.

name: TotallySpy
description:
TotallySpy is a website that lets you collect data from anyone and become a real life spy.
Using this app you can create actual portfolios of a person's life or just capture someones credit card number or OTP.
the goal of this website is to show how sensitive data is when opened in public and how careful we should be with it.
TotallySpy reminds us that there is no privacy.
short_description: TotallySpy is a website that shows how vulnerable your data is when you open it in public, and how easy it is to capture someone's information when its opened in the wrong place.

name: BeatMatch
description:
BeatMatch will offer a flexible platform for creating music playlists that match as
precisely as possible the user’s taste and situation (mood, activity, etc.). Its purpose is to provide an interface with the ability to learn and improve the music choices for each user personally.
As a part of the registration process the user would enter details about him, his preferences such as favorite artists, favorite
music genres, favorite songs, etc.
short_description: BeatMatch creates personalized playlists based on user preferences (artists, genres, songs) and mood/activity. It learns from feedback to improve and tailor playlists uniquely for each user.

name: TaskFairy
description: TaskFairy is a web-based system that simplifies task and shift assignment in organizations. It provides managers with smart tools to create tasks and get algorithm-based recommendations based on availability, workload, and history. A central dashboard tracks status and key metrics, while employees can view their history and balance score. Features like shift swapping add flexibility. TaskFairy – Turning To-Dos into Ta-Das.
short_description: TaskFairy is a web app that helps organizations assign tasks and shifts fairly and efficiently using a smart algorithm, with tools for creating, managing, and adjusting assignments.

name: EUREKA!
description: Eureka! is a mobile app that helps users find lost items by matching them with items found by others. Users upload a photo and details, and the system uses smart algorithms to compare images, time, and location. When a match is found, both users are notified and can chat securely. The app encourages trust, quick resolution, and community collaboration.
short_description: An innovative lost-and-found platform that connects people who lost items with those who found them — using image recognition, smart filters, and real-time match notifications.

name: Easy Invest
description: Easy Invest is an innovative platform democratizing venture capital for tech startups. We empower ordinary individuals, regardless of funds or technical understanding, to easily invest in promising early-stage companies. By simplifying the process and leveraging crowdfunding, Easy Invest removes traditional barriers. We're opening a new avenue for regular people to participate in future tech growth, making startup investing straightforward and efficient for everyone.
short_description: Easy Invest simplifies tech startup investing for everyone, democratizing venture capital.

name: Oracle
description: Encrypted applications, such as messaging platforms and VPNs, have become integral to maintaining privacy and security in digital communication. However, the widespread use of encryption also poses challenges for network management, including traffic optimization and policy enforcement. This thesis proposes a machine learning and AI-driven framework to identify, classify, and optimize encrypted traffic patterns without decrypting the data, ensuring both privacy and efficiency.
short_description: This thesis proposes a machine learning and AI-driven framework to identify, classify, and optimize encrypted traffic patterns

name: HolidAI
description: HolidAI is an AI-based vacation planning platform that allows users to generate personalized itineraries. The user enters trip preferences—destination, dates, interests, constraints—and HolidAI returns a custom day-by-day itinerary.
short_description: HolidAI is an AI-based vacation planning platform that allows users to generate personalized itineraries.

name: SpotWise
description: SpotWise is a location intelligence platform that guides business owners to the ideal commercial space. Using AI and real-time urban data, SpotWise analyze foot traffic, demographics, and competition to deliver tailored recommendations. Our interactive map makes it easy to explore and choose with confidence. Whether it's a café or retail store — SpotWise helps you grow from the right spot.
short_description: SpotWise helps entrepreneurs find the best location for their business using AI, real-time data, and smart recommendations — all through a friendly, easy-to-use map.

name: ELEV8
description: Elev8 is designed to capture the collective wisdom of the most successful investment firms. By tracking the top holdings of elite hedge funds through their 13F filings, we construct an index that mirrors the behavior of institutional giants. This approach offers everyday investors a data-driven, research-backed strategy aligned with the world’s top capital allocators.
short_description: Success Leaves Clues, We Follow Them

name: FLAI
description: By analyzing real flight data, trends, and patterns, we developed a model that helps travelers identify when flight prices are likely to be at their lowest. The system includes a user-friendly web interface that allows users to search for flights and receive predictions based on data-driven insights, aiming to help users save money and plan smarter trips.
short_description: FLAI is a data science project that predicts the best time to book a flight ticket based on price trends and machine learning models.

name: Mood
description: This project is developing a product that automatically creates Spotify playlists based on the user's desired atmosphere and input parameters—either predefined or entered in real time. The product leverages artificial intelligence to analyze song data, identify trends, and personalize music selections to suit specific situations, user preferences, and moods.
short_description: Mood - Play the right music for your mood.

name: Super Smart
description: This platform redefines online shopping with smart pricing tools, real-time collaboration, and AI features. It compares cart totals across stores, uses AI to scan receipts and analyze price history, and helps users find the best deals. Social Carts let users collaborate, chat, and edit their cart together in real time. With wish lists, alerts for price drops, and shared carts, it's a smarter, connected way to shop.
short_description: A collaborative shopping platform that compares prices across stores, tracks price history, and uses AI-driven insights to help users make smarter purchasing decisions—together.

name: ThreatMesh
description: A central server that receives data from the computers on the network it is located in (via an agent on the endpoint), stores the information in the cloud DB and scans for CVEs for the versions found on the endpoints, along with additional system details.
short_description: A system for scanning known vulnerabilities in operating system and application versions.

name: SmartKitchen
description: Smart Kitchen provides a comprehensive solution for kitchen management through the phone using advanced technologies and AI. It tailors recipes based on available ingredients, dietary restrictions, nutritional goals and user's preferences. The system also generates shopping lists for missing items and offers interactive cooking guidance with real-time adjustments. Designed for user convenience, it ensures that meals are efficiently planned, cooked, and consumed while minimizing food waste.
short_description: A smart kitchen system that manages inventory, suggests personalized recipes, and generates shopping lists based on user preferences, aiming to reduce food waste and optimize cooking.

name: CollectiveIQ
description: CollectiveIQ is a next-gen social platform where AI meets authentic connection. Powered by a multi-model AI ecosystem, it delivers rich content, real-time chat, and smart discovery. Unique features like "Challenge Me" spark debates between AI models, offering diverse insights on any topic. With intelligent tagging and advanced search, CollectiveIQ helps the right content reach the right audience—fostering meaningful conversations in a smarter, more connected world.
short_description: CollectiveIQ: AI-powered social platform for intelligent content discovery, real-time discussions, and meaningful connections through smart recommendations.

name: AdaptiveMind
description: The AdaptiveMind thesis implements hierarchical early-exit neural networks for efficient task-adaptive computation. It optimizes resource use by exiting early for simple tasks (e.g., digits in MNIST, basic arithmetic in MathNet) and processing complex tasks (e.g., CIFAR-10 images, nested math expressions) deeper. With smart regularization and confidence-based exits, it ensures high accuracy and low computational cost. Applications include real-time systems and tutoring.
short_description: AdaptiveMind: Hierarchical Early-Exit Neural Networks for Efficient Task-Adaptive Computation

name: BaTTeRi
description: BaTTeRi offers a scalable and cost-effective “EV Charging as a Service” solution. In collaboration with BaTTeRi, we developed an app that allows users to summon our dedicated charging robot to their parking spot, track charging status in real time, and view their charging history. Thomas, the charging robot enables rapid DC charging at every parking spot in supported facilities.
short_description: A smart mobile app that lets users summon Thomas, the charging robot, view order status, and access their charging history. all in collaboration with the startup BaTTeRi.

name: Efficient Monitor Sampling
description: This research project explores techniques to improve CPU and memory monitoring by reducing redundancy while preserving key insights. We used clustering to detect patterns, time-of-day analysis to adapt to usage cycles, and predictive models to target high-value moments. Leveraging CPU-memory correlation further refined sampling. These methods improved prediction accuracy and significantly reduced the number of required samples.
short_description: A research project exploring efficient CPU and memory monitoring through clustering, learning algorithems, and time-of-day patterns.
